column1: '''Hobitit''' (Finnish: '''Hobbits''') was a Finnish TV mini series which aired in [[1993]] for 9 episodes on [[wikipedia:YLE

The series follows the story of [[Frodo Baggins]] and [[Samwise Gamgee]] as they head for Mount Doom. Most of the other story - the [[War of the Ring]] raging in [[Rohan]] and [[Gondor]] - has been omitted.
